title: Wo, Xiu Xianjie De Gongdi

synonyms: The Public Enemy of the Immortal World

synopsis:
One day, Li Wuwang suddenly awakens to find himself, as the villain, kidnapping Wan Zheng, the Holy Maiden of the Wan Chao Sect, and fleeing. Before Li Wuwang can even react, the "system" that appears before him quickly issues him a mission: strip the Destiny Points of the chosen one. Either complete the mission and survive, or fail and become an ant dying under the sword of the chosen protagonist.

(Source: Youku, translated)
